item.title: IceCreams
item.description: These IceCreams are reviewed by the IlmHub Team Breyers Suitable to consume, mono & diglycerides is plant-based. Also, Kosher symbol displayed. Nestle Drumsticks Suitable for consumption, alcohol content is explained in the following fatwa. click here AskHalal Team ~ Supervised by Sheykh Faisal Mahmoudi
